repositories.author: ximsfei
repositories.name: Stark
repositories.description: Stark is a hot-fix framework for Android. It supports swapping new implementations of classes without restarting a running Android application, and updated Android resources (icons, layout, etc) while only restarting the Android Activity. Most importantly, there is no private API invoked in Stark.
